snippet: A police statement described the group as a “terror cell,” but also said the suspects were stockpiling large amounts of arms for sale on the black market.
abstract: Jordanian police officers raid the hide-outs of men suspected of being weapon and drug traffickers, setting off rare gun battle's in the kingdom's normally peaceful capital.
lead_paragraph: A police statement described the group as a “terror cell,” but also said the suspects were stockpiling large amounts of arms for sale on the black market.
